name: Venusaur

attacks.name: Giga Drain
attacks.effect: You may remove up to 2 damage counters from Venusaur.

attacks.name: Pollen Bomb
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon must pay 2 more in order to retreat.

flavor: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.
